dialogue.text: Hmmm... Give us a moment, would ya, Guy?
Kenshiro settles into his stance, feet as firm as the roots of a mountain.
You look down, feeling a wave of shame, hands trembling slightly, breathing shallowly.
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]The imposing drummer notices.[/shake]
You are nervous. I know of nerves, how they can consume you and hold your will hostage.
I can share a technique with you, one that allows you to take back your voice.
It is called box breathing. As you do it, imagine each step is the side of a box you're moving around
And hold again for four counts...
Woah, ok... I'll let you try it on your own. I'll go over there, and once you're ready to talk again, I'll answer any questions.
